All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    Account
    This DTO contains details necessary for interfacing with the database's Account table.
    AccountController
    This is the web API controller class handling pathing to the Account, Transfer, and Users tables.
    AccountDao  
    AccountService
    This class's APIs contain details necessary for retrieving data from the Account table and securely passing it to the View.
    App
    This is the main application class.
    AuthenticatedUser
    This model class contains details necessary for storing a specified user's auth token passed by the server on login.
    AuthenticationController
    This is the web API controller class used to authenticate users.
    AuthenticationController.LoginResponse
    Object to return as body in JWT Authentication.
    AuthenticationService
    This class's APIs handle user login, registration and authentication.
    AuthenticationServiceException
    This is the exception handler class for Authentication failures.
    Authority
    This DTO contains details necessary for interfacing with the database's Account table.
    BadFunds
    This exception is thrown when insufficient or invalid funds are entered.
    ConsoleService
    This is the application's view class.
    ConsoleServiceTest  
    InvalidTransferIdChoice
    This is the exception handler class for Invalid transfer choices.
    InvalidUserChoiceException
    This is the exception handler class for Principal user selection.
    JdbcAccountDao
    This class implements the common functionality needed to retrieve user accounts from the database.
    JdbcTransferDao
    This class implements the common functionality needed to retrieve transfers from the database.
    jdbcTransferStatusDao
    This class implements the common functionality needed to retrieve transfer statuses from the database.
    jdbcTransferTypeDao
    This class implements the common functionality needed to retrieve transfer types from the database.
    JdbcUserDao  
    JwtAccessDeniedHandler  
    JwtAuthenticationEntryPoint  
    JWTConfigurer  
    JWTFilter
    Filters incoming requests and installs a Spring Security principal if a header corresponding to a valid user is found.
    LoginDTO
    DTO for storing a user's credentials.
    RegisterUserDTO
    This DTO contains details necessary for interfacing with the database's Account table.
    SecurityUtils  
    TenmoApplication
    This is the server class.
    TokenProvider  
    Transfer
    This DTO contains details necessary for interfacing with the database's Transfer table.
    TransferDao
    This interface defines common functionality needed to retrieve transfers.
    TransferService
    This class's APIs contain details necessary for retrieving data from the Transfer table and securely passing it to the View.
    TransferStatus
    This DTO contains details necessary for interfacing with the database's TransferStatus table.
    TransferStatusDao
    This interface defines common functionality needed to retrieve transfer statuses.
    TransferStatusService
    This class's APIs contain details necessary for retrieving data from the Transfer Statuses table and securely passing it to the View.
    TransferType
    This DTO contains details necessary for interfacing with the database's TransferType table.
    TransferTypeDao
    This interface defines common functionality needed to retrieve transfer types.
    TransferTypeService
    This class's APIs contain details necessary for retrieving data from the Transfer Types table and securely passing it to the View.
    User
    This DTO contains details necessary for interfacing with the database's User table.
    UserCredentials
    This model class contains properties necessary for storing a specified user's login credentials on registration for database input.
    UserDao
    This interface defines common functionality needed to retrieve user credentials.
    UserModelDetailsService
    Authenticate a user from the database.
    UserNotActivatedException  
    UserNotFoundException
    This is the exception handler class unfounded users.
    UserService
    This class's APIs contain details necessary for retrieving data from the User table and securely passing it to the View.
    WebSecurityConfig  
    WrongPrincipalApproved
    This exception is thrown when the wrong Principal tries to approve a pending transfer request.
